feed.title: Your Spotify Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.11.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Allow to display ranking using either Count or Duration @Blackcheckgamer in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/395
  • Allow to delete public token so that no url can access your account #409

Bug fixes

  • Fixed not being able to visit a public token while logged in #334
  • Fixed file names not being visible in dark mode by @M2K3K5 #420 üòè

Miscellaneous

  • Set use-credentials for manifest file by @aseevlx in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/397
  • Add dedicated frontend error page when API_ENDPOINT points to the frontend by @RagingCactus in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/404
  • Make sure Mongo restarts by @mtthidoteu in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/425
  • Fixed some minor typos in various files; fixed CORS verbiage by @kmanwar89 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/402

New Contributors

  • @Blackcheckgamer made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/395
  • @aseevlx made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/397
  • @kmanwar89 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/402
  • @mtthidoteu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/425
  • @M2K3K5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/423

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.10.1...1.11.0

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Spotify extended streaming history schema to match new format by @mroetsc in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/454
  • Fix calculation of negative percentages in getPercentMore by @tigattack in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/450
  • Update selected tab on the settings page based on URL path on page load by @M2K3K5 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/436
  • Automatic OAuth login and session expiration check with redirect to login page by @M2K3K5 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/434
  • Update dependencies by @Yooooomi in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/455

New Contributors

  • @tigattack made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/450
  • @M2K3K5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/436
  • @mroetsc made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/454

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.11.0...1.12.0

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.13.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: add prometheus metrics by @RomainNeup in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/493
  • Feature: Live imports frontend by @Yooooomi in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/505
  • Fix: badges in README by @RomainNeup in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/495
  • Fix: update index.html to use new Spotify CDN URL by @FiFTX in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/497
  • Fix: slow Docker container termination by @gabe565 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/491
  • Fix: correct background color for blacklist artist search in both themes by @M2K3K5 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/428
  • Fix: zoom cover images instead of stretching by @Galacs in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/487
  • Fix: importing deleted songs through full privacy by @Yooooomi in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/506
  • Misc: add server routes README by @RomainNeup in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/494
  • Misc: set opencontainer labels of docker images by @SIMULATAN in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/471
  • Misc: Updated dependencies by @Yooooomi in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/507
  • Misc: GHCR deployment by @Yooooomi in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/511

New Contributors

  • @FiFTX made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/497
  • @SIMULATAN made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/471
  • @gabe565 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/491
  • @Galacs made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/487

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.12.0...1.13.0

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.13.1
entry.content:
Hello, sorry for forgetting to bump the version, making apps wrongly show they are outdated. This is fixed now.

What's Changed

  • Feature: can select wether to enable or not the affinity feature as an admin #476
  • Fix: ensure package versions are in sync with the tags by @razvanazamfirei in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/513
  • Fix: client ghcr repo not being pushed to on release by @gabe565 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/517
  • Fix: can now build the server when having both client and server dependencies installed #518
  • Misc: updated dependencies

New Contributors

  • @Stenz123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.13.0...1.13.1

entry.title: New release for Your Spotify: 1.14.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Format hrs:mins durations nicely by @SIMULATAN in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/538
  • Add preset interval for today by @M2K3K5 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/528
  • Focus interval more on this day, this week, etc
  • Fixed collaborative feature @DavideSirico in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/529
  • Clarify documentation and examples around the CORS setting by @RagingCactus in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/533
  • Mask sensitive query parameters in HTTP logs by @AlexGustafsson in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/526
  • misc: include local timestamp in logger output by @M2K3K5 in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/531

New Contributors

  • @DavideSirico made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/529
  • @AlexGustafsson made their first contribution in https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/pull/526

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Yooooomi/your_spotify/compare/1.13.1...1.14.0
